constituent: seize, pack of wild dogs, radio caroline, flowers, vessels, turkey, crotch
heisigStory: A pack of wild dogs . . . flowers . . . vessels. Do not confuse this with the character for arrest (Frame 706).
koohiiStory1: A pack of genetically-modified wild dogs is seized by a group of Greenpeace activists and taken onboard the Greenpeace vessel (the flower vessel, see safeguard (#700)).
koohiiStory2: Customs just seized a crate of poppies (flowers) detected by trained wild dogs who inspected the vessel.
myStory: giật. lấy. con mèo núp hoa lấy đếm chim
